messages.title: Election Communication
messages.content: There are around 130 seats that the Conservatives haven't won in at least 50 years. Only the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour.

messages.title: Without the Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A vote for the Brexit Party is presented as essential to achieve a 'real Brexit'.

mentions.tacticalSituation: There are around 130 seats that the Conservatives haven't won in at least 50 years.

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Brexit Party can deliver a real Brexit.

images.caption: A man in a suit, presumably Tariq Mahmood, with the statement 'Without the Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit.'

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet appeals to 'Leavers' and portrays the Brexit Party as the only option for a genuine Brexit, emphasizing a strategic voting situation where the Brexit Party is positioned as the primary opposition to the Labour party in areas the Conservatives have historically not won.
